title: 服务器崩溃，求解决！
author: Chen是个G佬
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-4 21:05 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Shall we play a game?

Time: 16-2-4 下午2:54
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop
        at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73154_d(ChunkProviderServer.java:277)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72964_e(World.java:739)
        at noppes.npcs.NPCSpawning.getChunk(NPCSpawning.java:114)
        at noppes.npcs.NPCSpawning.findChunksForSpawning(NPCSpawning.java:72)
        at noppes.npcs.ServerTickHandler.onServerTick(ServerTickHandler.java:16)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler_48_ServerTickHandler_onServerTick_WorldTickEvent.invoke(.dynamic)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler.invoke(ASMEventHandler.java:54)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:138)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onPreWorldTick(FMLCommonHandler.java:272)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:914)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:430)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:798)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:658)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: 小德德
replies.txt_content:
小德德 发表于 2016-2-4 19:45
---挖矿争霸崩溃报告----//你为什么这么做？ 时间：2015 2/26上午12:32Description：初始化gameorg。lwjgl ...

replies.txt_content:
